title: cendUr kandanai
sahitya:
cendUr kandanai nADi shenravan pugazh pADi vandanai purindOrin vAzhvu sirandiDumE


anupallavi

  cintai sidaindiDavE nondu ayarumpOdu kandA undan tuNai tandaruL enak-kOri


caraNam    sharaNam enru tanadu sannidhi sEra varum dharaNiyOraip-parivODu tAngum dayAparan
kurai tIra tanniDam muraiyiDum aDiyAr nirai vAzhvu perumAru aruL kUrum udAran
